name: Chris & Megan
message: With only a short time to do some trekking the Ghorepani-Ghandruk circuit was incredible with breathtaking views. Thanks to Mr Ram for his great hospitality and making sure we had a great time.

name: Julia
message: Ram and hitestimoniyelass team did a fabulous job in helping us to organize our trekking tour to Upper Mustang & Lo Manthang. Ram not only arranged all the necessary documents, permits and transportation (flights and busses) but also a very experienced and helpful mountain guide, Laxman.

name: Phuong Thu Thuy
